original_text: When thou dost lend thy brother any thing, thou shalt not go into his house to fetch his pledge.
korean_text: 네 이웃에게 무엇을 꾸어줄 때에 너는 그의 집에 들어가서 전당물을 취하지 말고

sentences.original_text: When thou dost lend thy brother any thing
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 형제에게 무엇을 빌려줄 때에

sentences.original_text: thou shalt not go into his house
